tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is a very good doctor. he connects with the children really well and  focuses on   development of the child in natural way. He doesn't recommend unnecessary medicines/multivitamins. Thats really appreciable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Bhasin gave us ample time inspite of having a number of patients lined up outside. He patiently addressed our issues and explained very well. A doctor who does not believe in giving medicines to newborns very easily. I highly recommend this doctor to all who are looking for a good paediatrician in north west Delhi.
**** ****** *** ************ *** ************ Doctor offers best advice and world class latest vaccines. Highly recommended.
